fields.name: Arrange a Driver:
fields.value: ** Swap two players. Any visits targeting the one will target the other. You may use this in conjunction with the Factional Attack, provided you attack one of the swapped players. You are immune to redirection when using this ability.

fields.name: Break the Broker (Charge 90%):
fields.value: Grant your target an indefinite disability. The next time they would gain an ammo for an ability, they won't. If they would gain an ammo for multiple abilities in the same night, one is chosen randomly.

fields.name: Cut In:
fields.value: Use during the evening phase, before results. Transfer one fifth of your Mafia target's score to another player. In exchange, your target gains 0.1x additional defense power tonight.

fields.name: Supply Chain (Passive):
fields.value: Triggered when you score above 50%. All Mafia players can use abilities tonight without spending ammo, even if they have zero ammo.
